skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Places a [Shield] buff for 2 turns on the ally with the lowest HP. The value of the [Shield] is equal to 15% of the ally’s MAX HP.
skills.name: Tanglestaff

skills.desc: Attacks all enemies. Has an 80% chance of removing all buffs. Places a 5% [Poison] debuff for 2 turns on each enemy for every buff removed from them. Also has an 80% chance of placing a [Block Buffs] debuff on all enemies for 1 turn.
skills.name: Vitriolic Thorns
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1

skills.desc:
Removes all debuffs from all allies. Places a 15% [Continuous Heal] buff for 1 turn on each ally for every debuff removed from them. 

Also places a [Shield] buff on all allies for 2 turns. The value of the [Shield] is equal to 25% of this Champion’s MAX HP.
skills.name: Hypertrophy

skills.desc: Whenever an enemy under a [Poison] debuff attacks an ally under a [Shield] buff, instantly activates 1 [Poison] debuff on that enemy. Also instantly activates 1 [Continuous Heal] buff on the attacked ally.
skills.name: Bramble Shaman [P]
